title: Bali Water Sport Tanjung Benoa (Half-day)
overview: Experience popular water sports like jet skiing, parasailing, and donut boat rides at Tanjung Benoa.

stops.description: Arrive and prepare for water sports.
Enjoy jet skiing and parasailing adventures.
Try the fun donut boat ride.

title: Bali Water Sport Tanjung Benoa Full Experience (Full-day)
overview: A full day of water sports excitement at Tanjung Benoa, including banana boat, snorkeling, and more.

stops.description: Arrive and prepare for a day of activities.
Ride banana boats and jet skis.
Snorkel and enjoy a donut boat ride.
